<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ProblemTaskStateSNC</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Problem task state constants, use these constants when determining which problem task state to use.</description> <name>ProblemTaskStateSNC</name> <script><![CDATA[var ProblemTaskStateSNC = Class.create();
ProblemTaskStateSNC.NEW = "151"; ProblemTaskStateSNC.ASSESS = "152"; ProblemTaskStateSNC.WORK_IN_PROGRESS = "154"; ProblemTaskStateSNC.CLOSED = "157";
ProblemTaskStateSNC.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
type: 'ProblemTaskStateSNC' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-20 09:28:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>35988ceb535b13004247ddeeff7b12cc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ProblemTaskStateSNC</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Problem Management Best Practice - Madrid - State Model" source="com.snc.best_practice.problem.madrid.state_model">fad449836de620100acb70b353433081</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_35988ceb535b13004247ddeeff7b12cc</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-06-19 06:30:50</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>337</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
